```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results='asis', 
  echo = FALSE
)
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)

# Set this to true to have links turned into footnotes at the end of the document
PDF_EXPORT <- FALSE

# Holds all the links that were inserted for placement at the end
links <- c()

source('parsing_functions.R')


# First let's get the data, filtering to only the items tagged as
# Resume items
position_data <- read_csv('positions.csv') %>% 
  filter(in_resume) %>% 
  mutate(
    # Build some custom sections by collapsing others
    section = case_when(
      section %in% c('research_positions', 'industry_positions') ~ 'positions', 
      section %in% c('data_science_writings', 'by_me_press') ~ 'writings',
      TRUE ~ section
    )
  ) 

```

intro_text <- "I am an executive advisor and strategic operations professional with 18 years of experience supporting senior leaders at the highest levels of government. My career has centered on bridging strategy, operations, and implementation, ensuring executives have the insights, processes, and structures needed to succeed in complex environments.

I turn senior leader intent into actionable strategies and solutions that strengthen decision-making and mission success through policy, operations, or emerging tools like data and AI. 

QUALIFICATIONS SUMMARY

•	Proven ability to synthesize complex information into clear, persuasive executive products such as decision memos, policy papers, and strategic briefs supporting high-level policy and strategy development.

•	Overseas administrative and operational activities, aligning staff actions with senior leader priorities and identifying risks to ensure mission success.

•	Leader in AI and data modernization, developing dashboards, automated reporting, and an AI prompt library to improve efficiencies and drive a culture of modernization.

•	Experience collaborating with external partners, including supporting a Department of State partnership by drafting and reviewing the memorandum of agreement and assisting in developing the capability testing plan that informed final funding approval.

•	Experienced supervisor of civilians, officers, and enlisted personnel; Sets performance standards, mentors, and develops teams to meet evolving mission requirements.
"
